abstract: WakeUpWalMart.com is introducing a fresh round of ads in addition to naming several Democratic political strategists to leadership positions.
snippet: WakeUpWalMart.com is introducing a fresh round of ads in addition to naming several Democratic political strategists to leadership positions.
lead_paragraph: WakeUpWalMart.com, a union-backed group that has waged an aggressive campaign against Wal-Mart, the nation’s largest retailer, will today name several Democratic political strategists as its new leaders and introduce a fresh round of ads.

headline.main: Democratic Advisers Take Posts in Group Opposing Wal-Mart
headline.print_headline: Democratic Advisers Take Posts In Group Opposing Wal-Mart
